channel.title: Game crashing every game, even rejoining
channel.description:
#### What happened? I enter the game, log in, join a match, select a name and then it crashes, it says it creates a crash dump folder, but before that I restart the game and rejoin the match but it crashes again after 20 seconds or so. I've uploaded my crash dumps of trying to join and rejoin a game here: https://drive.google.com/open?id=1XAafHc1nK_9mG0XqnZ6_RR24fhiCcsx6
#### What was SUPPOSED to happen? Play the game normally, this is another laptop, first time i tried playing here.
#### Steps to reproduce: Play the game, join a match
#### Comments:

item.title: Game crashing every game, even rejoining
item.dc:creator: Ellie
item.description:
There appears to be a problem with your DirectX, which is an issue with driver or your OS. Make sure everything is up to date.

Read full topic
item.source: Game crashing every game, even rejoining

item.title: Game crashing every game, even rejoining
item.dc:creator: Insanity
item.description:
Welp.

Let see if a dev could try to fix this problem for you.

I am sorry you got ignored.

Read full topic
item.source: Game crashing every game, even rejoining
